name: Ymen - Danger Classroom
description:
Game pad Recommended !

It's hard to teach to super powered teens !

You play as Professor Yavier and you try to give a class but misbehaving kids have decided to annoy you. Avoid the laser vision and use your telekinesis power to throw them back their fireballs.

(Download on Windows for a better experience)

Control

Move: Arrow / left stick

Capture fireball: Mouse click / A Aim: Mouse / left click.

Game pad recommended

Credits

Art: Remy Dekor, Nicolas Nowak

Programming: Julien Berthou
